name: Crashed on Gub
description:
Crashed on Gub!

Space bugs ate your computer core. Now you are crashed on the planet Gub. Get to the local space port to catch a ride back home. You might find these bugs helpful in your journey.

Controls

Move with keyboard.
Shoot with mouse.

Very short game made for Kenney Jam 2017 with Construct 2 by lonesome grumpy rObOt.

Credits

SFX made with BFXR
MUSIK: Monkeys Spinning Monkeys Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
Art assets by Kenney.nl 

Have fun

grumpy Robot
